airportConditionDefinitions.text: ATC LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES IN OPERATION. CATEGORY THREE HOLDING POINTS IN USE.
INCREASED BIRD ACTIVITY WITHIN THE AERODROME BOUNDARY.
LARGE FLOCKS OF BIRDS HAVE BEEN OBSERVED WITHIN THE VICINITY OF THE AERODROME.
TURBULENCE MAY BE ENCOUNTERED IN THE FINAL STAGES OF THE APPROACH.
WINDSHEAR REPORTED.
BE ADVISED MODERATE MICRO-BURST FORECAST.
FLIGHT CREWS ARE REMINDED TO USE MINIMUM RUNWAY OCCUPANCY.
DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE AVAILABLE.
REPORT IF TWY L IS NOT USEABLE BETWEEN TWY QA AND TWY P ON FIRST CONTACT.
TWY E IS CLOSED.
AIRCRAFT VACATING VIA TWY ER MUST MAKE THE FIRST RIGHT ONTO TWY ^08L.
ONLY CALL FOR PUSH ONCE THE TUG IS CONNECTED AND READY TO GO.

airportConditionDefinitions.text: ATC LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES IN FORCE. CAT 3 HOLDING POINTS IN USE.
INCREASED BIRD ACTIVITY WITHIN THE AERODROME BOUNDARY.
LARGE FLOCKS OF BIRDS HAVE BEEN OBSERVED WITHIN THE VICINITY OF THE AERODROME.
TURBULENCE MAY BE ENCOUNTERED IN THE FINAL STAGES OF THE APPROACH.
WINDSHEAR REPORTED.
BE ADVISED MODERATE MICRO-BURST FORECAST.
PILOTS THAT ARE IN RECEIPT OF DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE REMINDED THEY MUST CONTACT DELIVERY ON 121.980 WHEN READY FOR START.
FOR START CLEARANCE CONTACT DELIVERY ON 121.980.
DELIVERY IS CLOSED, FOR START CLEARANCE CONTACT GROUND ON 121.705.
DELIVERY IS CLOSED, FOR START CLEARANCE CONTACT GROUND ON 121.905.
DELIVERY AND GROUND CLOSED, FOR START & TAXI CONTACT TOWER ON 118.505.
FOR START & TAXI CONTACT DIRECTOR ON 119.730.
PILOTS ARE EXPECTED TO CHANGE TO RWY 27L FOR LANDING AT 15:00 HOURS.
PILOTS ARE EXPECTED TO CHANGE TO RWY 27R FOR LANDING AT 15:00 HOURS.
PILOTS SHOULD EXPECT SRO FROM 23:30 HOURS.
DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE AVAILABLE.

notamDefinitions.Text: DATALINK CLEARANCES NOT AVAILABLE FOR CPT DEPARTURES.
